channel.title: sillygwailo tweets

item.description: @syncros @SNETCampbell MLB.‚Äãtv has a park sounds option in addition to being able to choose which broadcast to watch (the home or the away team‚Äôs crew). I don‚Äôt know if they do that anymore, but when I would switch to it, I found it buggy (it would often switch to play-by-play randomly).

@CatherineOmega I think about you every time No Man‚Äôs Sky goes on sale. https://t.co/W2lrrzp6ln

I biked along the Lakeshore Boulevard Activeway again today, and it was just as spectacular as I remembered it to be. #ActiveTO https://t.co/X2J7YPDSW9
Joke I wanted to make in the alt text but ultimately decided against, since I want to keep that space descriptive: ‚ÄúIn the background is the ExPlace Wind Turbine, the dominant feature of Toronto‚Äôs skyline.‚Äù https://t.co/2t5GAL7duL

This afternoon. https://t.co/6eqzOySMDy
Wind Oracle (2022) by Eduardo Navarro. https://t.co/rfLmWJ89QI
Just a reminder that Evander Kane presented a fake COVID-19 vaccine card to his previous team, and they wanted nothing to do with him as a result.
I cried 4 times during my second viewing of EEAAO.
I cried 4 times during the second viewing of EEAAO.

A combination of sites: @blogTO and @nowtoronto for general events, and @songkick (for getting notified when specific musical acts roll through Toronto) and I‚Äôm trying out @Bandsintown. @Pollstar has been historically good for seeing a city‚Äôs upcoming concerts. https://t.co/AGEnuZ4Xwj
Some of those sites have apps/email alerts, others I get reminded via RSS and notifications turned on for them.
Hearing ‚Äúthat‚Äôs admirable, but‚Äù makes me wonder if I should bother anymore.
üé∂ ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs gonna be a glorious day! / I feel my luck could change‚Äù üé∂ https://t.co/gKOHpnBB8W

To think, I was just reading about why the Australian Labor Party spells its name the way it does. #auspol #ausvotes https://t.co/CmtGwQoxGB

Tonight. https://t.co/VZ2KsCozVC
An Alex Anthopoulos shirsey with dollar signs instead of numbers is not something I‚Äôve ever seen before. https://t.co/LtBV032AAd
The ballpark is the only nightclub that will let a guy like me in.
My view from the cheap seats. https://t.co/zz3q4gdl0d
Blue Jays win! https://t.co/aXE9Y263CG
I went to see Cincinnati Reds great Joey Votto last night, and when he first came to bat, he got a warm welcome from the crowd here in his hometown of Toronto, but I thought he‚Äôd get a bigger ovation than he did.
Looking back, he had made some regrettable comments about Canada and Canadian baseball that he apologized for. Maybe those comments still sting, though.
He‚Äôs the greatest Cincinnati Reds player of all time for a reason, folks. https://t.co/0gF3nTqzgv
I happy for the greatest Cincinnati Reds player of all time. https://t.co/dTtrFRkFcx

@rtanglao @BookCrossingCom ü§î I might do that. There‚Äôs a map of the locations, so the data must be available somehow. If it is, I could also write a ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs the closest Little Free Library to me?‚Äù app. ü§î ü§î ü§î https://t.co/KhuBym3mVN
If I have books I want to release @BookCrossingCom-style, what would be some good places in Toronto to do it? Releasing them to a Little Free Library is an obvious one. What are some other ideas?
@TwitterBlue Can we get an edit-button-themed app icon? Just kidding, I wanted to be the first to make that joke.

I was really well put together today.
I saw a guy with the same getup as me that day and now I‚Äôm going to see it everywhere I look, aren‚Äôt I?
Tonight. https://t.co/pwvHkUKduX
Will Daredevil stop torturing his victims after he gets an answer from them in this series? https://t.co/O91MEd9kDJ

I have questions about this. https://t.co/VUmk3MhUZV
Remember how Twitter removes features because only a tiny percentage of people use them? I‚Äôm not saying they will in this case, but they‚Äôve done it in the past.
If we describe the image in the tweet, is the alt text necessary?
What level of detail is necessary? How many people are going to spend the amount of time it took to write the example they provide?
Does OCR, which his now baked into operating systems, make it unnecessary to provide alt text if the image is just words?
Are people abusing the alt text so they can have 1,000 more characters to write in a single tweet?
@cityoftoronto A complete list of road openings and freedoms is available at https://t.co/73EIPrUDk3
